parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all items assigned to the [[binocular]] weapon except magazines. Use [[binocularMagazine]] command for the latter. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''binocularItems''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[binocularItems]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addBinocularItem]], [[removeBinocularItem]], [[removeAllBinocularItems]], [[binocularMagazine]], [[weaponAccessories]], [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[weaponsItems]], [[weaponsItemsCargo]]
</value></part></template></root>
